00105 #ifndef _nt_vector_obj_h_
00106 #define _nt_vector_obj_h_
00107 
00108 #include "nt_obj.h"
00109 
00110 #include "nt_vector3_obj.h"
00111 
00112 #include <iostream>
00113 #include <math.h>
00114 
00115 //
00116 //  Class name : NT_vector_o
00117 //
00120 class NT_vector_o : public NT_o {
00121   public:
00122   NT_vector_o();
00123   NT_vector_o(NTuint dim);
00124   NT_vector_o(NTuint dim, NTreal * elemVec);
00125   NT_vector_o(NTuint dim, float * elemVec);
00126   // if NTreal != double uncomment the below line
00127   // NT_vector_o(NTuint dim, double * elemVec);
00128   NT_vector_o(NT_vector3_o newVector3);
00129   NT_vector_o(NTreal a, NTreal b);
00130   NT_vector_o(NTreal a, NTreal b, NTreal c);
00131   NT_vector_o(NTreal a, NTreal b, NTreal c, NTreal d);
00132   NT_vector_o(const NT_vector_o &);
00133   NT_vector_o& operator=(NT_vector_o const &);
00134   ~NT_vector_o();
00135   /*        Methods         */
00136   /*            Operators       */
00138   NT_vector_o operator+(const NT_vector_o &) const; 
00140   NT_vector_o operator-(const NT_vector_o &) const; 
00142   NTreal operator*(const NT_vector_o &) const; 
00144   NTreal Dot(const NT_vector_o right) const
00145   { return (*this)*(right);}   
00147   NTreal CosAng( const NT_vector_o right)
00148   { return (*this)*(right) / (Length() * right.Length()); }
00150   NT_vector_o operator*(NTreal) const; 
00152   NTreal &operator()(NTint component) const;  
00154   NTreal &operator[](NTint component) const;  
00155   NTreal operator^(NT_vector_o b);
00156   operator NT_vector3_o() const;
00157   friend ostream & operator<<(ostream & os, const NT_vector_o & self);
00158   /*        Functions       */
00159   NT_vector_o BaseVectorAngle() const;
00160   inline NTreal Length() const {return sqrt(LenSqr()); };
00161   NTreal LenSqr() const;
00162   NTuint _dim() const { return dimension;}
00163   /*        Element Functions   */
00164   NTuint _dimension() const { return dimension;  };
00165   const NTreal* _elem() const;
00166   void set_elem(const NTreal * elemVec);
00167   /*        Data        */
00168   private:
00169   /*        Methods     */
00170   void Init(NTuint newDim);
00171   void set_dimension(NTuint newDim);
00172   /*        Data        */
00173   NTreal* elem;
00174   NTuint dimension;  
00175 };
